attributes.action: Get the HGV Lorries off the roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why isnt anyone trying to get the HGV lorries off the road and back onto the trains and the water. We are an island why should they travel from one end of the country to another by road, they are the cause of so many accidents, put them back on trains and boats then the roads would be half empty therefore no need for road taxes. We did this years ago we can do it again.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
